summary: Simply put this mod reminds you from time to time to save your game
descriptionHtml:
Ever play skyrim and have auto saves turned off? I do all the time
Ever forget to save your game right after shopping or smithing for awhile then crash? i have
Do you have your skyrim modded to the point you have a tendency to crash multiple times in a session? some days
Do you crash at the most inconvenient times? occasionally

If you answered yes to any of these questions(or just want to be reminded)
Well then this mod is for you!
Now be reminded to save your game while running around cities or running around skyrim :D
Never forget to save your game again and lose all the work you put into your character
Nobody likes having to redo 30Â or 40minutes! or possibly longer for you?

I had talked with a few people and they all seemed interested and said theyd use it if one existed so here it is currently.Includes reminders in all cities and towns

To start the mod load up the game and open the console with `
now type in the following
help seso
you will now see the seso reminder "spell"
add it to your player with
player.addspell xxxxxxxx

if you are new xxxxxxx refers to the ID or the numbers beside the name

Future Plans include adding more locations around skyrim such as reminders in dungeons/ruins/caves and the like



V1.0 covers just cities and towns
author: NewJoker6
